description:
- Minor changes to first solo and rhythm guitar track
- Removed ending after the fade out that isn't actually in the song
- Fixed the interlude. Apparently Iommi plays it how it was previously live, but not on the recording.
title: Snowblind

description: Minor fixes to the first solo
title: Snowblind

description: Made tweaks to guitar and bass as well as added synth
title: Snowblind

description:
- Corrected vocals
- Changed instrument for vocal track
- Corrected solo
- Added chord symbols for the third verse and solo section
title: Snowblind

description:
- Added vocals and lyrics
- Fixed the interlude section
- Fixed the solos
title: Snowblind

description: Changed the tuning back to drop C# and changed the names of the tracks. Also tried to change the chord symbols to display what chord is being played if the song was in standard tuning. I think that would be more useful for most people.
title: Snowblind

description: New chords missing in one bar
title: Snowblind

description: Changed arpeggiated parts to what Tony plays and added let rings and chord symbols. They should also be easier to play, especially in the third verse. Changed the interlude section (101 - 116) so it has swing, its tempo is higher, and so it's what Tony actually plays. Moved and renamed some section markers. Slightly lowered the BPM. Made some slight changes to the riff at 21, 23, etc. Changed bass tuning to match guitar.
title: Snowblind

description: Changed the drummer from "Drumkit" to "Bill Ward."
title: Snowblind
